The resolution reads: ``Censuring Representative Al Green of Texas.

…Committee on the Judiciary, or their respective  designees, and provides each one a motion to recommit.

Finally, the rule provides that, during consideration of H.R. 4776,  pursuant to House Resolution 951, the further amendment specified in  section 5 of this resolution shall be considered as adopted.
